attributes.action: Stop the xl bullies from being put down
attributes.additional_details: In the realm of canine prejudice, XL bullies bear unjust stereotypes, facing a heartbreaking fate. Misunderstood and judged prematurely, their pleading eyes reflect the tragedy of a narrative cut short. Their untold stories beg for an intervention rooted in empathy and education, offering a chance for rehabilitation and a brighter future.
attributes.background: Stop the ban on xl bullies and stop killing them

rejection.details:
Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Scrap ban on dog breeds, regulate dog owners and ban euthanasia of healthy dogs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652050
